text: Luka IvanoviÄ‡ (born 18 May 1992), known professionally as Luke Black, is a Serbian singer and songwriter. He became the first Serbian artist to be signed under Universal Music Group. == Career == Luke Black won Serbia's Eurovision national selection contest and represented Serbia in the Eurovision Song Contest 2023 with the song "Samo mi se spava", placing 24th in the grand final. == Artistry == Described as the "Serbian pop alchemist", his music draws from a range of electropop and experimental pop music influences. title: Luke Black
